general_advisory: Farmers are advised to maintain standing water depth, irrigate fields, manage foot rot disease in paddy, apply zinc in deficient soil, and follow specific crop-related instructions provided in the advisory.

advisory: To manage stem borer, use Trichogramma japonicum card weekly and pheromone traps.
Apply specified insecticides for stem borer control.
To manage stem rot, drench soil with Validamycin or Captan + Hexaconazole.
Select resistant varieties to prevent red rot disease.
Soak setts in specified solution during planting.
To manage powdery mildew, spray specified fungicides.
To manage powdery mildew, spray specified fungicides.
To control cut worm, spray specified insecticides in the evening.
To control mites, spray specified miticides.
To control aphids, spray neem oil formulation or Flonicam.
To manage purple blotch and Stemphylium leaf blight, spray specified fungicides.
To control black spot disease, spray specified fungicides.
Maintain water depth for fish hibernation.
